'''Beta 1.19.10.24''' (Android) or '''Preview 1.19.10.24''' (Windows, iOS, iPadOS, Xbox) is the fifth and final beta/''Preview'' for [[Bedrock Edition 1.19.10]], released on June 23, 2022,<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/7119723507213|title=Minecraft Beta & Preview - 1.19.10.24|website=Minecraft Feedback|date=June 22, 2022}}</ref> which fixed some bugs. 

== Changes ==
=== Mobs ===
'''[[Allay]]'''
* Allay duplication now has a 5-minute cooldown.

=== General ===
'''[[Experimental Gameplay|Experiments]]'''
* Removed the Vanilla Experiment and Wild Update toggle since it has no active experimental content.

== Fixes ==
'''Mobs'''
* Fixed a bug that caused an empty trader llama Spawn Egg to appear in the Creative menu in pre 1.19.10 worlds.

'''Stability and Performance'''
* Fixed a crash when assigning an invalid entity to monster spawners.

'''Touch Controls'''
* Fixed touch control's right d-pad button not working when the d-pad area overlapped with the hotbar area ({{bug|MCPE-156103}}).

'''Commands'''
* Improved the performance of the locate biome command to mitigate stalls on the server while searching for a biome that is far away ({{bug|MCPE-157609}}).</onlyinclude>
